Mele Kolo Kyari (amụrụ na 8 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1965) bụ onye Naijiria na-amụ banyere ala, onye na-ere mmanụ ala na onye isi nchịkwa nke iri na itoolu (GMD) nke Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC)
Tupu nhọpụta a, Kyari bụ onye isi njikwa otu, ngalaba ahịa mmanụ ala nke NNPC na onye nnọchi anya mba Naịjirịa na Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) kemgbe afọ 2018.
A mụrụ Kyari na 8 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1965 na Maiduguri, Borno Steeti
Ọ gara Government Community Secondary School Biu na Borno State n'etiti afọ 1977 na afọ 1982
N'afọ 1987, ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị (BSc) na geology na sayensị ụwa na Mahadum Maiduguri.

Mgbe Maikanti Baru lara ezumike nká na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 7 Julaị, na afọ 2019, gọọmentị nke Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara Kyari dị ka GMD nke iri na itoolu nke ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa National Petroleum Corporation. N'afọ 1991, ọ sonyeere NNPC Processing Geophysicist na Integrated Data Services Limited
N'afọ 1991, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Ngalaba Geological Survey nke Naịjirịa dị ka Field Geologist
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka nchọpụta na National Petroleum Investment Management Services (NAPIMS) na afọ 1998

N'afọ 2007, Kyari duziri Production Sharing Contracts Management na Crude Oil Marketing Division (COMD). N'afọ 2014, ọ ghọrọ General Manager, Crude Oil Stock Management ebe n'afọ 2015 a kwalitere ya n'ọkwa Group General Manager, COMD. Ọ bụ onye na-elekwasị anya na Open Government Initiative, atụmatụ ahụ na-enyere gọọmentị aka ịchọpụta onye na-azụ ma na-ere mmanụ
Na 13 Mee, na afọ 2018, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya mba Naijiria na OPEC.
